Data Fields

GTHashEntry_st Struct Reference
[Verification]

This is a helper structure to represent hash chains.

#include <gt_base.h>

Data Fields

int hash_algorithm
int direction
int sibling_hash_algorithm
char * sibling_hash_value
int level

Field Documentation

int GTHashEntry_st::direction

The hash chain shape indicator. If direction is 0, then sibling_hash_value is concatenated to the left of the hash of the data from the previous step. If direction is 1, then sibling_hash_value is concatenated to the right of the hash of the data from the previous step. No other values are permitted.

int GTHashEntry_st::hash_algorithm

The algorithm used to perform the hash step. See GTHashAlgorithm for possible values.

int GTHashEntry_st::level

Indicates how many steps are allowed to precede the current step.

int GTHashEntry_st::sibling_hash_algorithm

The algorithm used to compute the sibling hash value. See GTHashAlgorithm for possible values.

char* GTHashEntry_st::sibling_hash_value

The hash value from the sibling in the tree, in base 16.
